pages.text:
Acquisition and Management
We Buy Parks!
wp:list
wp:list-item
Seeking retirement and family mobile home parks with competitive capitalization rates;
/wp:list-item
wp:list-item
Preferred states are Texas, Louisiana, Mississippi, Alabama, Georgia, Tennessee and Florida, and we will look at opportunities in other states;
/wp:list-item
wp:list-item
Metropolitan areas with a population of at least 200,000 people are preferred;
/wp:list-item
wp:list-item
Majority of lot rentals is preferred;
/wp:list-item
wp:list-item
50+ lot properties are preferred;
/wp:list-item
wp:list-item
Public or private utilities are accepted;
/wp:list-item
wp:list-item
2-star to 5-star quality parks.
/wp:list-item
/wp:list
Learn More
Monarch Management
At Monarch Management, we recognize the significance of cultivating an experience where residents feel safe, engaged, and truly at home. From festive holiday parties to exciting gift card raffles, the Monarch Management team goes the extra mile to instill a sense of enthusiasm and camaraderie within our managed communities.
With almost a decade of experience owning and managing 11 manufactured housing communities across Florida, Georgia, and Texas, and multiple RV parks, Monarch Management has the knowledge and resources to maximize your resident experience and asset profitability!
Learn More
By providing your phone number, you agree to receive text messages from Ivie Lane Partners Manager LLC. Inc. for the purpose of communicating community news, urgent notifications, and events. Reply “STOP” to opt-out anytime or reply “HELP” for more information. Message and data rates may apply. Message frequency will vary. For more information, please read our
Privacy Policy
and
Terms of Use
.

About Us
The Ivie Lane Mission
Enhancing the quality of life of our tenants, employees, and investors by focusing on:
Creating
well-maintained, clean, and safe communities for our tenants;
Inspiring
our employees to achieve more than they thought possible; and
Achieving
superior returns for our investors through high yielding cash flow properties.
Our History
Based in Orlando, FL, Ivie Lane was formed in 2015 and is a family-owned partnership focused on the acquisition and operation of mobile home parks. We value long-term relationships, and we strive to develop trusting relationships with all parties throughout the deal process.
Our Leadership Team
James T. (Deucie) Bies, Jr.
Email Deucie
President | Founder
James T. (Deucie) Bies, Jr. is the Founder and President of Ivie Lane Properties, a real estate fund based in Orlando, FL with a focus on the acquisition and operation of mobile home parks. Prior to forming Ivie Lane, Mr. Bies was a real estate sales associate and brokered over $200 million of multifamily and manufactured housing assets. He also worked as an attorney with Greenberg Traurig, P.A. where he represented and advised clients in connection with the sale, acquisition, development and management of hotel properties, the sale and acquisition of retail properties and debt restructuring transactions. Mr. Bies graduated cum laude from the Dedman School of Law and Cox School of Business at Southern Methodist University with a JD/MBA and earned a MS in Accounting and BS in Business Administration and Economics from Trinity University. Mr. Bies was previously a member of the State Bar of Florida, the State Bar of Texas and a Certified Public Accountant in Florida. Mr. Bies is married with two sons.
Tijah McGriff
Email Tijah
Regional Manager
Tijah McGriff is a dedicated and accomplished Multi-Market Manager with over six years of expertise in property management. Known for her strategic vision and attention to detail, Tijah has consistently achieved notable rent growth and positive revenue management. Her leadership and innovative approach have been pivotal in managing properties across Florida, Alabama, and beyond, demonstrating her ability to drive operational efficiency and elevate community standards.  Tijah’s hard work and creativity enable her to develop and implement effective management strategies that enhance tenant satisfaction and optimize financial performance. A proud alumna of the University of Florida with a degree in Public Relations, she blends academic insights with practical experience to deliver excellent results in property management.  When she’s not working, Tijah enjoys reading, going to the beach, and spending time with her family. Her commitment to excellence and passion for her work make her a standout leader in the industry.
Our Community Managers
Tijah McGriff
Email Tijah
Bass Capital MH & RV Park
Sunset by the Lake
Sunset by the Lake II
Tijah McGriff is a dedicated and accomplished Multi-Market Manager with over six years of expertise in property management. Her leadership and innovative approach have been pivotal in managing properties across Florida, Alabama, and beyond, demonstrating her ability to drive operational efficiency and elevate community standards.  Tijah’s hard work and creativity enable her to develop and implement effective management strategies that enhance tenant satisfaction and optimize financial performance. A proud alumna of the University of Florida with a degree in Public Relations, she blends academic insights with practical experience to deliver excellent results in property management.  When she’s not working, Tijah enjoys reading, going to the beach, and spending time with her family. Her commitment to excellence and passion for her work make her a standout leader in the industry.
Leah Essary
Email Leah
Glen Oaks MHP
The Wilderness
Leah Essary brings over 10 years of property management experience to our team at Ivie Lane. As the property manager of The Wilderness, in Kerrville, Texas, she oversees the daily operations and management of one of our largest communities. Leah is the friendly voice on the other end of the line that is eager to step in and help when and where she can! She strives to provide excellent customer service, build lasting relationships with her residents, and foster a strong sense of community at The Wilderness! A native to Kerrville, Leah enjoys spending her free time with her husband and two kids. She is active in the community through volunteer work, and she loves to lend a hand to her family’s ranching operation. Leah comes to work each week motivated and with a positive attitude!
Lindsey Hancock
Email Lindsey
Conrad MHP
Palm Circle Community
The Park on 46th
Villa Plumosa MHP
Lindsey Hancock is the property manager for four mobile home and RV communities for Ivie Lane, located in St. Petersburg and Seminole, Florida. Lindsey began her career in 2006 while managing multifamily properties, in her hometown of Columbus, Ohio, and has continued to further her experience, knowledge, and skillset since relocating to St. Petersburg in 2010. Her extensive background and industry experience range from conventional to affordable housing, privately owned properties, large commercial organizations to solo investors, multifamily to mobile home parks, and everything in between! Lindsey thrives in daily operational oversight, project management, and building long term relationships with her residents and community alike! She takes pride in cultivating strong connections and providing top-notch customer service. Lindsey is a valuable leader and team member of Ivie Lane. The role Lindsey holds closest to her heart is being a mother. Her free time is dedicated to spending time with her son, daughter, husband, and three dogs. She enjoys going to the beach, reading, and watching crime dramas.
Damon Monteaux
Email Damon
The Ivie at Huffman
With 18 years of dedicated success in the property management industry, Damon Monteaux’s journey began as a leasing consultant in his 20s. Over the years, he has risen through the ranks, honing his expertise and developing a true passion for the multifamily sector. Damon’s deep love for the industry has driven his continuous growth, allowing him to thrive in every role he’s taken on. A proud native Texan, Damon has worked all across the state, building a wealth of experience in property management. Though his career has taken him to many places, he is happy to call Houston home, where he combines his professional dedication with his love for the city’s vibrant culture. While Damon is incredibly committed to his work and achieving success, he understands the importance of balance. Outside of his career, he cherishes time spent with his husband, enjoying life’s adventures and traveling the world. Damon’s commitment to both personal and professional fulfillment is the foundation of his enduring success in property management. Whether leading teams, managing properties, or building relationships with clients and residents, Damon approaches every challenge with the same passion and dedication that have defined his 18-year career.
Become Part of The Family
At Ivie Lane, it is our passion is to transform properties into communities and sites into homes.
If you are looking for an exciting opportunity to work with great people, then Ivie Lane is the company for you.
Interested?
Contact Us
Our Core Values
Collaboration
end valueflex
